title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 529 - Exempt Organizations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 529 - Exempt Organizations

State Regulations
§ 529.1 - General
§ 529.2 - New York State, agencies, instrumentalities, public corporations, and political subdivisions thereof
§ 529.3 - United States of America, agencies and instrumentalities thereof
§ 529.4 - United Nations or other international organizations
§ 529.5 - Diplomatic missions, diplomatic personnel and foreign government-owned enterprises and agencies
§ 529.6 - Health maintenance organizations
§ 529.7 - Religious, charitable, scientific, testing for public safety, literary or educational organizations, organizations which foster national or international amateur sports competition, and organizations for the prevention of cruelty to children or animals
§ 529.8 - Posts and organizations consisting of past or present members of the Armed Forces of the United States
§ 529.9 - Certain Indian nations or tribes
§ 529.10 - Rural electric cooperatives
§ 529.11 - Protest procedures
§ 529.12 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 529

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 1116, 1142[1], [8], 1250; L. 2008, ch. 57, Part KK-1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
